(EST. 2018)

About Us

Haze is simple band formed in 2018 in Pasig City. The band started by doing covers of popular songs both foreign and local. The band is adept at playing in various musical genres.

The band's initial members were a group of college students composed of vocalist Jhonna Magat, drummer JC De Dios, along with guitarists Mark De Mauro, Nina Marinel, and Lowi Adrian Colinares, all hailing from Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Pasig.
